Levels.auditory: Participant should focus only on auditory stimuli
Levels.visual: Participant should focus only on visual stimuli.

Levels.bad_event: An event presentation that should not have been made.
Levels.dark_bar: Presentation of a dark blue square.
Levels.hear_word: Auditory and visual presentation of a hear cue.
Levels.light_bar: Presentation of a light blue square.
Levels.look_word: Auditory and visual presentation of a look cue.
Levels.pause_recording: Pause the recording of the experiment.

Levels.attended: Indicates that the stimulus should be attended to.
Levels.unattended: Indicates that the stimulus should be ignored.

Levels.cue_auditory: Cue indicating participant should focus on auditory stimuli.
Levels.cue_visual: Cue indicating participant should focus on visual stimuli.
Levels.infrequent_stimulus: Stimulus that is designated as the one to be looked for.
Levels.target_detected: A target in the attended to modality has been detected.

Levels.attend_auditory: Experimental condition in which participant only pays attention to auditory stimuli.
Levels.attend_visual: Experimental condition in which participant only pays attention to visual stimuli.
Levels.shift_attention: Experimental condition in which participant shifts attention based on instructions.

trial.Description: Number of the trial within the experiment.

sub_block.Description: Number of the sub-block within the experiment. A sub-block starts with a cue word and ends when the next sub-block begins.
